mapper.insert: INSERT INTO rubato_freeboard (fbnum, fbid, fbtitle, fbcontent, fbhit, fbreplycount) VALUES (rubatofb_seq.nextval, #{param1}, #{param2}, #{param3}, 0, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT t1.fbnum, t1.fbid, t1.fbtitle, t1.fbcontent, t1.fbdate, t1.fbhit, t1.fbreplycount, t2.mname FROM rubato_freeboard t1, rubato_member t2 WHERE t1.fbid = t2.mid ORDER by t1.fbnum DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE rubato_freeboard SET fbhit=fbhit+1 WHERE fbnum=#{param1 }
